title: SEBI Updates Master Circular for LODR Compliance Rules
content:
# SEBI Updates Master Circular for LODR Compliance Rules

Ek important update hai! Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) ne apne Master Circular on Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements (LODR) Compliance Rules ko update kiya hai. Yeh update 30 January 2026 ko kiya gaya hai.

Is Master Circular ka main objective hai ki listed entities ke liye LODR Regulations, 2015 se related sabhi operative circulars, clarifications, aur instructions ko ek single reference document mein consolidate kiya ja sake.

*   **Master Circular Number:** HO/49/14/14(7)2025-CFD-POD2/I/3762/2026
*   **Original Issue Date:** July 11, 2023
*   **Last Updated Date:** January 30, 2026
*   **Key Purpose:** Is update se compliance mein aur clarity, uniformity aur predictability aayegi. Isme 30 December 2025 tak ke sabhi relevant circulars ko incorporate kiya gaya hai. Pehle ke jo circulars LODR compliance se related the, unhe ab is Master Circular mein subsume kar liya gaya hai, jisse interpretational ambiguity kam hogi.
